Name: SkyScrappers
About the game: SkyScrappers is a classic arcade-style, vertically scrolling, competitive fighting game. Select from a diverse range of extreme sportspeople, to fight and race your way to the top of a falling skyscraperâ€¦ as it is being demolished. Play with up to four players in classic couch-multiplayer, now available with steam remote play to coach co-op online with friends. With four campaigns, learn the stories of our fighters and how their paths cross! Alternately just set up a skirmish with AI bots Classic arcade feel and style Breathtaking hand-drawn artwork 60fps action Skill-based gameplay Full controller support 1-4 Player Local Multiplayer Single player story mode
